required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Drug Interaction Study With Dabigatran Etexilate and Dronedarone in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: Relative Bioavailability of a Single Dose of 150 mg Dabigatran Etexilate (Capsule) When Administered Alone or in Combination With a Single Dose of 400 mg Dronedarone Tablet) or in Combination With 400 mg Bid Dronedarone (Tablet) at Steady State in Healthy Male and Female Volunteers (an Open Label, Randomised, Four-sequence, Two Period Cross-over, Phase I Study)

brief_summary.textblock: The objective of the study is to assess the relative bioavailability of a single dose of dabigatran after concomitant multiple oral administration of dronedarone with the aim to investigate whether and to what extent the P-gp inhibitor dronedarone affects pharmacokinetic parameters of dabigatran when administered to healthy subjects

primary_outcome.measure: Total Dabigatran: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 h before drug administration and 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00, 36:00, 48:00 h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total dabigatran in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

primary_outcome.time_frame: 1 h before drug administration and 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00, 36:00, 48:00 h after drug administration
primary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of total dabigatran in plasma, per period.

secondary_outcome.measure: Free Dabigatran: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 h before drug administration and 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00, 36:00, 48:00 h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of free dabigatran in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 1 h before drug administration and 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00, 36:00, 48:00 h after drug administration
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum measured concentration of free dabigatran in plasma, per period.

arm_group.description: Capsule, oral administration with 240 mL water
Capsule and Tablets, oral administration with 240 mL water
Capsule and Tablets, oral administration with 240 mL water
Capsule and Tablets, oral administration with 240 mL water
Capsule and Tablets, oral administration with 240 mL water

intervention.description: dabigatran etexilate 150 mg plus dronedarone 400 mg as single dose
dabigatran etexilate 150 mg plus dronedarone 400 mg as single dose (staggered administration)
dabigatran etexilate 150 mg single dose plus dronedarone 400 mg bid
dabigatran etexilate 150 mg single dose plus dronedarone 400 mg bid (staggered administration)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion criteria:
1. Healthy male and female subjects
Exclusion criteria:
1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: In this crossover study, subjects were randomly assigned to one of the 4 sequences, but with 5 treatments. In general terms ABDE,ACED,BDEA,CEDA. There were four subjects in Trt E who took Dronedarone mistakenly in place of Dabigatran. These are presented separately for adverse events.

group.title: TrtA -- TrtB -- TrtD -- TrtE
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given simultaneously (Trt. B), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E)

group.title: TrtA -- TrtC -- TrtE -- TrtD
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given 2h later (Trt. C), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D)

group.title: TrtB -- TrtD -- TrtE -- TrtA
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given simultaneously (Trt. B), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A)

group.title: TrtC -- TrtE -- TrtD -- TrtA
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given 2h later (Trt. C), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A)

participants_list.participants: Treatment A was followed by a washout period of at least 96 hours.
Treatment A was followed by a washout period of at least 96 hours.
No washout period. Treatment D followed directly after treatment B.
No washout period.Treatment E followed directly after treatment C.
No washout period. Treatment E followed directly after treatment D.
No washout period. Treatment D followed directly after treatment E.
The last dose of Dronedarone was followed by a washout period of at least 10 days.
The last dose of Dronedarone was followed by a washout period of at least 10 days.

baseline.population: Treated set contains of all subjects who were dispensed study medication and were documented to have taken at least one dose of study drug.

group.title: TrtA -- TrtB -- TrtD -- TrtE
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given simultaneously (Trt. B), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E)

group.title: TrtA -- TrtC -- TrtE -- TrtD
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given 2h later (Trt. C), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D)

group.title: TrtB -- TrtD -- TrtE -- TrtA
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given simultaneously (Trt. B), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A)

group.title: TrtC -- TrtE -- TrtD -- TrtA
group.description: Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg given 2h later (Trt. C), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given 2h later (Trt. E), followed by Dabigatran 150mg + Dronedarone 400mg bid given simultaneously (Trt. D), followed by Dabigatran 150mg (Trt. A)

outcome.title: Total Dabigatran: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
outcome.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total dabigatran in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
outcome.time_frame: 1 h before drug administration and 0:30, 1:00, 1:30, 2:00, 3:00, 4:00, 6:00, 8:00, 10:00, 12:00, 24:00, 36:00, 48:00 h after drug administration
outcome.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set defined as all subjects randomised, treated and who provided evaluable data for at least one observation for at least one primary endpoint without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

measure.title: Total Dabigatran: Area Under the Curve 0 to Infinity (AUC0-∞)
measure.description: Area under the concentration-time curve of total dabigatran in plasma over the time interval from 0 extrapolated to infinity.
measure.population: Pharmacokinetic (PK) set defined as all subjects randomised, treated and who provided evaluable data for at least one observation for at least one primary endpoint without important protocol violations relevant to the evaluation of PK.

analysis.groups_desc: 150mg DE + 400mg DR same time (TrtB) vs 150mg DE (TrtA)
analysis.p_value_desc: p-value for geometric mean ratio being outside interval 80% to 125%
analysis.method_desc: ANOVA with sequence, period and treatment as fixed effects and subject within sequence as random effect.
analysis.estimate_desc: The standard deviation is actually the Geometric coefficient of variation.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: Any publication of the result of this trial must be consistent with the Boehringer Ingelheim publication policy. The rights of the investigator and of the sponsor with regard to publication of the results of this trial are described in the investigator contract.
